title: Commutative and Associative Properties of Multiplication
text: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression: $$8.14\times {10}^{-7} 6.5{10}^{10}=8.14\times6.5 {10}^{-7} {10}^{10}$$
speech: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression:  8.14 times 10 to the negative 7, 6.5 10 to the tenth is equal to 8.14 times 6.5 10 to the negative 7, 10 to the tenth
pacedSpeech: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression:   8.14 times 10 to the negative 7, 6.5 10 to the tenth is equal to 8.14 times 6.5 10 to the negative 7, 10 to the tenth

title: Product Rule of Exponents
text: Use the product rule of exponents to simplify the expression: $$8.14\times6.5 {10}^{-7} {10}^{10}=52.91{10}^3$$
speech: Use the product rule of exponents to simplify the expression:  8.14 times 6.5 10 to the negative 7, 10 to the tenth is equal to, 52.91 10 cubed
pacedSpeech: Use the product rule of exponents to simplify the expression:   8.14 times 6.5 10 to the negative 7, 10 to the tenth is equal to, 52.91 10 cubed

title: Scientific Notation
text: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation: $$52.91{10}^3=5.291\times {10}^4$$
speech: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation:  52.91 10 cubed, is equal to, 5.291 times 10 to the fourth
pacedSpeech: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation:   52.91 10 cubed, is equal to, 5.291 times 10 to the fourth
